{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Design Architect",
  "description": "Spatial Haven is a reputable interior design and construction firm in Lagos, dedicated to delivering exceptional design spaces that exceed our clients&#39; expectations. We specialize in transforming environments through innovative design and high-quality construction. Our passion lies in creating inspiring, functional spaces that beautifully reflect each client&rsquo;s unique vision.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Design Architect

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Job Description


	We are looking for a skilled Design Architect with a strong background in interior design and construction to lead our design team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for creating innovative and functional spaces.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement design concepts for interior design projects
	Collaborate with clients to understand their design requirements and preferences
	Conduct site visits and assessments to determine design feasibility
	Prepare and present design proposals, including 2D and 3D visualizations
	Work closely with our construction team to ensure seamless execution of designs
	Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in interior design and architecture


Requirements


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Architecture or a related field
	At least 3 years in interior design and architecture
	Strong portfolio showcasing your design skills and experience
	Excellent communication, presentation, and project management skills
	Proficiency in design software, including AutoCAD, Revit, and SketchUp.


Benefits


	Net Salary: N200,000 - N250,000 / Month.
	Competitive salary and benefits package
	Opportunity to work on high-profile interior design projects
	Collaborative and dynamic work environment
	Professional development and growth opportunities.
	HMO, Annual Leave.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV and portfolio to:&nbsp;spatialhaven1@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.",

  "validThrough": "2025-11-01",

Design Architect Job at Spatial Haven




        
    

        
        Spatial Haven is a reputable interior design and construction firm in Lagos, dedicated to delivering exceptional design spaces that exceed our clients' expectations. We specialize in transforming environments through innovative design and high-quality construction. Our passion lies in creating inspiring, functional spaces that beautifully reflect each client’s unique vision.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Design Architect

Job Location: Lagos

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are looking for a skilled Design Architect with a strong background in interior design and construction to lead our design team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for creating innovative and functional spaces.


Responsibilities


	Develop and implement design concepts for interior design projects
	Collaborate with clients to understand their design requirements and preferences
	Conduct site visits and assessments to determine design feasibility
	Prepare and present design proposals, including 2D and 3D visualizations
	Work closely with our construction team to ensure seamless execution of designs
	Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in interior design and architecture


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Architecture or a related field
	At least 3 years in interior design and architecture
	Strong portfolio showcasing your design skills and experience
	Excellent communication, presentation, and project management skills
	Proficiency in design software, including AutoCAD, Revit, and SketchUp.


Benefits


	Net Salary: N200,000 - N250,000 / Month.
	Competitive salary and benefits package
	Opportunity to work on high-profile interior design projects
	Collaborative and dynamic work environment
	Professional development and growth opportunities.
	HMO, Annual Leave.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV and portfolio to: spatialhaven1@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Openings at Palace Workers Solutions
content:
Palace Workers Solutions is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

1.) Sales Representative

Job Location: Ojodu Berger, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Sales presentations: Effectively present products or services, highlighting how they meet customer needs and solve problems.
	Negotiation and closing: Negotiate prices and terms, prepare sales agreements, and close deals to meet sales quotas.
	Customer relationship management: Build and maintain strong, positive relationships with clients to ensure satisfaction and repeat business.
	Product knowledge: Maintain a thorough understanding of company products and services, as well as market trends and competitor offerings.
	Reporting and tracking: Keep track of sales activities, analyze performance, and report on metrics to management.
	Lead generation: Identify and contact potential customers through methods like cold calling or networking.


Key Skills and Qualifications


	Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication and interpersonal skills are essential for interacting with clients and colleagues.
	Customer service: A strong customer-focused mindset and the ability to resolve complaints and issues.
	Sales acumen: A knack for persuasion, negotiation, and closing deals.
	Adaptability and resilience: The ability to handle challenges and adapt to market changes.
	Educational background: A high school diploma is often the minimum, but many employers prefer a bachelor's degree in business or a related field.
	Please note that living around Berger, Ogba, Ojodu is an added advantage


Application Closing Date: 4th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send a copy of their CV to: thecarpentersloungeng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For inquiries, call 08164980412.

 

 

2.) Waitress

Job Location: Ogba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Order Management: Take accurate food and drink orders, communicate them to the kitchen, and serve meals and beverages in a timely manner.
	Customer Service: Anticipate guest needs, check in with customers during their meal, and professionally address any concerns or complaints to ensure satisfaction.
	Dining Area Maintenance: Set and reset tables, maintain a clean and organized dining space, and perform cleaning duties.
	Payment Processing: Handle cash and credit card transactions and deliver checks to customers.
	Teamwork: Collaborate effectively with other servers, kitchen staff, and hosts to ensure smooth operations.
	Guest Interaction: Greet customers, guide them to tables, present menus, and provide recommendations.


Essential Skills & Qualities


	Interested candidates should possess an OND /HND Bachelor`s Degree with a minimum of 1 year of work experience. 
	Customer Service: A friendly demeanor and genuine enthusiasm to provide a positive and memorable experience for guests.
	Communication: Excellent verbal communication skills to accurately convey orders and interact with guests and staff.
	Multitasking: The ability to efficiently manage multiple tasks and requests in a high-pressure environment.
	Stamina: Physical strength and stamina to work long hours on their feet and carry trays of food and drinks.
	Attention to Detail:Meticulousness in taking orders, serving food, and maintaining the cleanliness of the dining area.
	Knowledge of Menu: Memorization of menu items, specials, and ingredients to answer questions and make recommendations.


Application Closing Date: 3rd November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send a copy of their CV to: thecarpentersloungeng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

3.) Cashier

Job Location: Ogba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Processing Transactions: Accurately recording sales using cash registers or point-of-sale (POS) systems.
	Handling Payments: Accepting cash, credit cards, debit cards, and checks, then providing the correct change.
	Customer Service: Greeting customers, answering questions, and resolving complaints professionally.
	Maintaining the Checkout Area: Keeping the workstation clean, organized, and stocked.
	Accuracy: Ensuring that pricing and product information are correct.


Application Closing Date: 16th October, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: sanwooreoluwatomi@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

     

    

        Click here to Apply

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Manager",
  "description": "At Anettcom Technologies, we develop a one-of-a-kind solution for the benefit of our clients, offering the most creative and distinctive solution that satisfies their needs and expectations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Osogbo, Osun
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	Social Media Manager is responsible for developing, implementing, and managing the company&rsquo;s social media strategy to increase brand awareness, engagement, and lead generation.
	This role involves creating original content, analyzing performance metrics, managing campaigns, and staying up-to-date with digital trends to ensure consistent growth across all platforms.


Responsibilities


	Strategy &amp; Planning.
	Content Creation &amp; Management.
	Engagement &amp; Community Management.
	Analytics &amp; Reporting.


Qualifications &amp; Skills


	B.Sc. Degree or HND qualification&nbsp;in Marketing, Communications, or a related field
	Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role.
	Strong understanding of major social media platforms and analytics tools.
	Excellent writing, editing, and communication skills.
	Creative mindset with an eye for design and storytelling.
	Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.
	Familiarity with SEO, digital advertising, and influencer marketing is a plus.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;vacancy@anettcom.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;Candidates must be residents of Osogbo.",

Social Media Manager Job at Anettcom Technologies




        
    

        
        At Anettcom Technologies, we develop a one-of-a-kind solution for the benefit of our clients, offering the most creative and distinctive solution that satisfies their needs and expectations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager
Job Location: Osogbo, Osun
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

            
    




	Social Media Manager is responsible for developing, implementing, and managing the company’s social media strategy to increase brand awareness, engagement, and lead generation.
	This role involves creating original content, analyzing performance metrics, managing campaigns, and staying up-to-date with digital trends to ensure consistent growth across all platforms.


Responsibilities


	Strategy & Planning.
	Content Creation & Management.
	Engagement & Community Management.
	Analytics & Reporting.


Qualifications & Skills


	B.Sc. Degree or HND qualification in Marketing, Communications, or a related field
	Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role.
	Strong understanding of major social media platforms and analytics tools.
	Excellent writing, editing, and communication skills.
	Creative mindset with an eye for design and storytelling.
	Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.
	Familiarity with SEO, digital advertising, and influencer marketing is a plus.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: vacancy@anettcom.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Candidates must be residents of Osogbo.    

    

        Click here to Apply
